chunks.chunk_text: 想知道薪水入帳後該如何管理投資新手又該何時入場出國旅遊怎麼玩追什麼我是蔡尚樺邀請您來收聽玉山銀行全新Podcast玉山學堂在這裡我將和不同世代的來賓一起聊投資談消費分享最實用的理財觀念讓理財不只是數字而是更輕鬆更有趣的生活方式現在就點擊連結收聽一起開啟幸福人生
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hi there歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday回顧星期天在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家以及主題的熱門更多文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事趣聞Let's get started
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: To the Borneo CarderNorth East of Amsterdam'sBustling City Center in 1999The neighborhood was barely more than a clusterof commercial docksand underused warehousesIt was for poor peopleA lot of artistslived on boats she saidsitting in her neat cozy living roomjust below the water lineIn the quarter century sinceBosmaa 62 year old social worker
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: and her husband have raised two sons on the distalA 1912 82 foot freighterwhich stripped of its engine, fuel tanks and cargo holdis one of Amsterdam's iconic houseboatswith a seagoing hull, wheelhouse and curtented windowsThree boats down lies the B18an elegant 131 foot2.5 story floating mansion
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: more than 3,000 square feet of interior spacethat showsjust how perfectly the soul of a luxury yachtcombines with open space livingand elegant living quartersIt has to be a ship on the outsideand a house on the insidesaid Heiss Haverkater53 who created the vesseland lives on it with his familyIn the Dutch capitalhouseboats have gone upmarket
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: The owners are wealthyand discerninginterested in newdesignsupgraded comfortand sustainabilityHaverkatera designer by tradehopes his boatwill inspire others to build on the waterHe runs Urban ShipsA company that builds customized houseboatsdesigned to look like shipsAfter years of servingas a relatively cheap placeto live in an expensive city
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: The whale's share of the price increase comes from the value of the berth, not the shipA typical Amsterdam canal berthmight be worth close to a half a million
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: dollars depending on its locationand how big a shipit will allowSome of the olderunrenovated ships in those berthsmight be worth only $20,000Building a new shipof courseis much more expensiveBut in this gentrificationdebatethe cost of new berthsis less importantthan the architecture of the shipand whether they ever servedas actual commercial ships
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: The canal now holds anincreasing number offloating housesdesigned to look like oceangoing vesselsbut with hardly anyof the working featuresof a real boat
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: A free house may sound like a scamBut Japan faces an unusual property problemIt has more homesthan people to live in themIn 2013, there were61 million housesand 52 million householdsaccording to the Japan Policy ForumAnd the situation is poised to get worse
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: The population is expected to declinefrom127 millionto about 88 millionby 2065according to the National Instituteof Population and Social SecurityMeaning even fewer people will need housesAs young peopleleave rural areasfor city jobsJapan's countryside has become hauntedbut deserted ghost housesIt's predicted that by 2040
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: nearly 900 towns and villagesacross Japanwill no longer existAnd Okutama is one of themIn that context, giving awaypropertyis a bid for survivalNext article

chunks.chunk_text: John Schutler,Amazon's Vice President for Global Real Estate and Facilities, said the company would spend tens of millions of dollars on the design and construction of the shelter's portion of the building.Amazon will pay the utilities for Mary's Place, which will occupy the space rent-free, although the organization will continue to pay its own staff.Schutler said
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 房屋相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 homes.json

chunks.chunk_text: Amazon was impressed by Mary's Place, and he described its plan to give the shelter a permanent home as an investment in the neighborhood.
